ValidationRule.description: This is used in Request for corporate card, to show error message when filling section 8 without selecting corresponding value in Workflow Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and ( (ispickval (Status__c , 'Draft')), Workflow__c = $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.Requestsforcorporatecard.Name__c, (NOT(INCLUDES(WorkflowType__c , 'Unlock Corporate Card'))) , NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( RequestExtension3__r.Reasonforunlock__c )))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Not allowed to enter data in section 8 without selecting the Unlock Corporate Card value in Workflow Type.
